title: So... I think a bot just tried to add me..
body:
With 0 runes, 0 masteries, no match history and somehow level 30... how does that even happen?

http://puu.sh/g4TRz/12332cabca.jpg
http://puu.sh/g4TSW/79a1406fab.jpg
http://puu.sh/g4TUh/80fd826399.jpg

http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/30140

Like.. what?

replies.body: It could be one of those bought accounts. Those ones that people lvl up from just bots and have no MMR or masteries. I know someone who did buy an acc and thats what it looked like.
Bot games still show up in your match history though.

You'd think there would be systems in place to detect bots that are as obvious as this.

But no.
Wow, ha ha looks like a bot!

What??? What?????

Riot, step up your game. :D

(Looking at your icon, mouth watering)

-GL,HF
